protein.specific_function: Condensing enzyme that catalyzes the synthesis of both saturated and monounsaturated very long chain fatty acids. Exhibits activity toward saturated C18 to C26 acyl-CoA substrates, with the highest activity towards C22:0 acyl-CoA. Important for saturated C24:0 and monounsaturated C24:1 sphingolipid synthesis.

go_class.description: fatty acid elongation, monounsaturated fatty acid
fatty acid elongation, saturated fatty acid
very long-chain fatty acid biosynthetic process
